text:
="preserve">Terry Wayne Tausch (February 5, 1959 – March 25, 2020) was an American football guard in the National Football League. He was born in New Braunfels, Texas. Tausch played for Minnesota Vikings from 1982 to 1988 and for San Francisco 49ers in 1989.
On March 25, 2020 he died at his home in Plano, Texas at the age of 61.
